content: here is a freebie snoopy pattern for all of you i ve always wanted to give back to the crochet community without the generosity of others sharing their knowledge i never would have learned what i know now i hope this pattern brings you some joy im excited to share it basic crochet skills are required pattern includes simplified instructions in a math format ex magic_ring 6 increase x 6 and photos of all the parts like most amigurumi the size options are pretty flexible i used worsted weight yarn and a 4 25 mm hook but feel free to play with different yarns and hooks to create a whole new look happy crocheting <3 and feel free to share your creations with me on here or instagram **@astitchinthedark** ~vikki davis~
